**Wikipedia summary**:
<p class="mw-empty-elt">
</p>

<p><i><b>Clinocardium </b></i> is a genus of marine bivalve molluscs in the family Cardiidae, the cockles. It is monotypic, being represented by the single species <i><b>Clinocardium nuttallii</b></i>, also known as the <b>basket cockle</b> or <b>Nuttall's cockle</b>, a large edible saltwater clam.
</p>
